newsitem.title: ITALY: General Electric eyes ENI, Enel j/v.
newsitem.headline: General Electric eyes ENI, Enel j/v.

text.p: General Electric is interested in linking up with a new power-generating company which is being set up by energy group ENI and state utility Enel, GE's CEO Paolo Fresco said.
Fresco said in an interview with Milan business weekly Il Mondo: "I think we will establish collaborative relations with the new joint venture created by ENI and Enel."
"Whether this becomes a capital stake investment or another form of alliance remains to be seen," Fresco said in an interview released in advance of publication.
Fresco said he had already held talks with ENI Managing Director Franco Bernabe and Enel chief Franco Tato.
Earlier this month ENI and Enel announced an agreement to establish Italy's largest independent electricity production company. -- Milan newsroom +392-66102321
